languages.english-overview:
Open Source Social Network also know as OSSN is a social networking software written in PHP.
Open Source Social Network allows you to make a social networking website, helps your members build social relationships with people who share similar professional or personal interests.
Open Source Social Network is released under the GPL ( GNU General Public License ) version 2.

ul.li: Realtime activity notifications, newsfeed, instant chat
Comment, tag, rate any kind of content

languages.english-b_date_exp: Please enter the Birth Date in DD-MM-YYYY format.
languages.english-err_adminlen5: The username length should be 5 or more characters.
languages.english-err_date: The date has to be in DD-MM-YYYY format.
languages.english-err_birthday: Birth Date has to be between 1 and 31.
languages.english-err_birthm: Birth Month has to be between 1 and 12.
languages.english-err_birthy: Birth Year has to be between 1915 and 2018.
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
